VALIDATION.EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
VALIDATION.PASSWORD: Password must contain one digit from 1 to 9, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one underscore but no other special character, no space and it must be 8-16 characters long.
VALIDATION.NAME: Username must begin with a letter, and can not contain, numbers
VALIDATION.LASTNAME: Last name must begin with a letter and cannot contain numbers.
VALIDATION.MIDDLENAME: The middle name must begin with a letter and cannot contain numbers.
VALIDATION.TELEPHONE: Phone number must start with country code + 380 followed by exactly 9 digits
VALIDATION.TELEGRAM: The username in Telegram must start with @ and contain from 2 to 32 characters, where the first character after @ must be a letter
VALIDATION.MIN: This field must contain at least 3 characters
VALIDATION.MAX: This field must be at most 100 characters
